sentences.sentence: (This is why Polygram or lie detector tests accurately test for lying, because they measure jumps in blood pressure).
sentences.translation: 这也是多项描记图和测谎仪能测试出人是否撒谎，因为撒谎时，人的血压会升高。

sentences.sentence: This is why Polygram or lie detector tests accurately test for lying, because they measure jumps in blood pressure.
sentences.translation: (这就是为什么多道记录仪或测谎仪能对准确检测说谎，因为它们测量血压升幅)。

sentences.sentence: In March 1975, Sam received the gold record award with this album from Polygram records at the annual awards ceremony.
sentences.translation: 一九七五年三月，许冠杰在丽的主办的《金唱片大会串》凭这大碟荣获宝丽金唱片公司颁赠金唱片。
